Job Title: Senior Product Marketing Manager, Sage Network

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
About our Senior Product Marketing Manager role.As our Senior Product Marketing Manager, you will drive the strategic narrative, market positioning, and creation of value propositions for the Sage Network. Sage Network is our new platform for automating financial transactions between a company and its vendors, customers, financial institutions, and Governments. The Senior Product Marketing Manager will be instrumental in building the product marketing strategy to drive product-led growth, customer success, and competitive positioning.
What’s in it for you?Along with joining a truly global team, you will take the lead in proposing development prioritisation, packaging, and pricing strategies that optimise revenue and network growth via customer and market insights. You will have the ability to develop creative and innovative product marketing strategies driven by a product-led growth approach with customers insights.
LocationHybrid working, 2 days per week out of our Atlanta office
Summary of your day-to-day?You will support the Head of PMM and the leadership team in designing the business unit’s Growth Plan, through strategic thinking and analysis to understand the customer, market, ecosystem and competitor landscape. You will help create clarity around how we win and be accountable for directing GTM acquisition channels whether embedded, direct, partner or developer, with propositions that inspire and drive impactful launches. You will cover the breadth of the PMM craft and will be accountable for both strategic and execution.
Minimum Qualifications6 years + Experience in a customer and commercially led Product Marketing roleExperience of product-led growth applications and platform-based offersStrong knowledge of building a data driven proposition building including the market in the regionExperienced in product marketing methodologies, including Human Centered Design (HCD) combined with marketing/communications
Perks? We have plenty.Competitive annual bonusesComprehensive health, dental, and vision coverage401(k) retirement match (100% matching up to 4%)32 days paid time off (21 personal days, 10 national holidays, 1 floating holiday)18 weeks of paid parental leave for birth, adoption, or surrogacy offered 1 year after the start dateWork Away, an opportunity to work & play for 10 weeks in any country of your choice (from a Sage-approved list)5 days paid yearly to volunteer (through Sage Foundation)$5,250 tuition reimbursement per calendar year starting 6 months after the hire dateSage Wellness Rewards Program ($600 wellness credit and $360 fitness reimbursement annually)

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
